title: InverJara
description: Web application for managing and analyzing financial data. It allows you to upload information, view interactive graphs, pivot tables and export data in various formats.

title: Devs Learning
description: Platform to sell and take online courses, with features such as user management, course catalog and responsive design. Ideal for online learning.

title: Trip Boys Gang
description: Online store for TripBoysGang that allows you to manage products, place orders and handle high quality images, ideal for e-commerce.

title: Translate Clone
description: Web tool that replicates the functionality of Google Translate, allowing you to translate text in real time with a simple and efficient design.

title: Weather App
description: Application that provides real-time weather information for any location, with an intuitive interface and design adaptable to mobile devices.
